topic: Artificial Intelligence in Medical Imaging and Radiology

  entities:

    Large Language Models|Technology

  proposition: Chenbin Liu and colleagues published a study on artificial general intelligence for radiation oncology in Meta-radiology in 2023.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Chenbin Liu|PUBLISHED_IN|Meta-radiology
    Chenbin Liu|RESEARCH_YEAR|2023

    Chenbin Liu|RESEARCH_TYPE|Artificial General Intelligence

    entity-entity relationships:
    Chenbin Liu|COLLABORATOR|Colleagues

  proposition: Zhengliang Liu and team evaluated large language models for radiology natural language processing in 2023.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Zhengliang Liu|RESEARCH_YEAR|2023
    Zhengliang Liu|RESEARCH_FIELD|Radiology
    Zhengliang Liu|RESEARCH_TYPE|Natural Language Processing

    entity-entity relationships:
    Zhengliang Liu|EVALUATED|Large Language Models

  proposition: Andreas Schaich and researchers discovered an own-age bias in recognizing faces with horizontal information in a 2016 study.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Andreas Schaich|RESEARCH_YEAR|2016
    Andreas Schaich|RESEARCH_TYPE|Face Recognition
    Andreas Schaich|DISCOVERED|Own-age Bias

    entity-entity relationships:

  proposition: Agostina J Larrazabal and colleagues found that gender imbalance in medical imaging datasets produces biased classifiers for computer-aided diagnosis.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Agostina J Larrazabal|RESEARCH_FIELD|Medical Imaging
    Agostina J Larrazabal|DISCOVERED|Gender Imbalance Bias

    entity-entity relationships:
    Gender Imbalance|IMPACTS|Computer-aided Diagnosis

  proposition: Ian L Alberts and team explored the potential impact of large language models and ChatGPT on nuclear medicine in a 2023 publication.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Ian L Alberts|RESEARCH_YEAR|2023
    Ian L Alberts|RESEARCH_FIELD|Nuclear Medicine

    entity-entity relationships:
    Large Language Models|IMPACT|Nuclear Medicine
    ChatGPT|IMPACT|Nuclear Medicine

topic: Embodied AI and Simulation Platforms

  entities:
    Chengshu Li|Researcher

    Habitat 3.0|Platform
    Voyager|Agent
    VIMA|Robot Manipulation System

    CVPR|Conference

  proposition: Chengshu Li and researchers introduced BEHAVIOR-1K, a benchmark for embodied AI with 1,000 everyday activities and realistic simulation in 2022.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Chengshu Li|RESEARCH_YEAR|2022
    BEHAVIOR-1K|ACTIVITIES_COUNT|1000
    BEHAVIOR-1K|RESEARCH_TYPE|Embodied AI Benchmark

    entity-entity relationships:
    Chengshu Li|INTRODUCED|BEHAVIOR-1K

  proposition: Matt Deitke and colleagues developed RoboTHOR, an open simulation-to-real embodied AI platform presented at CVPR in 2020.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Matt Deitke|RESEARCH_YEAR|2020
    RoboTHOR|RESEARCH_TYPE|Embodied AI Platform

    entity-entity relationships:
    Matt Deitke|DEVELOPED|RoboTHOR
    RoboTHOR|PRESENTED_AT|CVPR

  proposition: Xavi Puig and team created Habitat 3.0, a co-habitat for humans, avatars, and robots in 2023.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Xavi Puig|RESEARCH_YEAR|2023
    Habitat 3.0|RESEARCH_TYPE|Co-habitat Platform

    entity-entity relationships:
    Xavi Puig|CREATED|Habitat 3.0
    Habitat 3.0|INCLUDES|Humans
    Habitat 3.0|INCLUDES|Avatars
    Habitat 3.0|INCLUDES|Robots

  proposition: Yang Liu and researchers conducted a comprehensive survey on aligning cyber space with the physical world through embodied AI in 2024.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Yang Liu|RESEARCH_YEAR|2024
    Yang Liu|RESEARCH_TYPE|Comprehensive Survey

    entity-entity relationships:
    Embodied AI|ALIGNS|Cyber Space
    Embodied AI|ALIGNS|Physical World

  proposition: Guanzhi Wang and colleagues developed Voyager, an open-ended embodied agent with large language models in 2024.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Guanzhi Wang|RESEARCH_YEAR|2024
    Voyager|RESEARCH_TYPE|Embodied Agent

    entity-entity relationships:
    Guanzhi Wang|DEVELOPED|Voyager
    Voyager|USES|Large Language Models

  proposition: Yunfan Jiang and team introduced VIMA, a general robot manipulation system with multimodal prompts in 2023.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Yunfan Jiang|RESEARCH_YEAR|2023
    VIMA|RESEARCH_TYPE|Robot Manipulation System

    entity-entity relationships:
    Yunfan Jiang|INTRODUCED|VIMA

  proposition: Angel Chang and researchers published Matterport3D, a study on learning from RGB-D data in indoor environments in 2017.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Angel Chang|RESEARCH_YEAR|2017
    Matterport3D|RESEARCH_TYPE|RGB-D Data Study
    Matterport3D|ENVIRONMENT|Indoor
